title: Japanese video games adapted into movies - box office revenue 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Film title (original writer company) in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.

The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) and lowest at Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega).

Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has 22.61 times more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega) which is has the lowest.

The highest Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has 298.6 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega).

The Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, followed by Resident Evil: Afterlife (Capcom), and Resident Evil: Retribution (Capcom). Down to the Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega) which is the lowest.
The Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega) has 2.22 times less Revenue in million U.S. dollars than average.
